changeSet.createView: SELECT name,lower(email),telephone ,STRING_AGG(contact, ', ') as contact FROM ( SELECT split_part(data, ' - ', 1) AS name, split_part(replace(split_part(data, ' - ', 2), ' . ', '.'), ' ', 1) AS email, replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace( replace( split_part(data, ' - ', 2), ' . ', '.') , ' .', '.'), split_part( replace(replace(split_part( data, ' - ', 2), ' . ', '.'), ' .', '.'), ' ', 1), '') , ' / ', '***'), ' ', ''), '-', ''), '+33', '0'),'.', ''), '/', ''), '***', ' / ') AS telephone, contact FROM ( SELECT contact_presse AS data, 'presse' AS contact FROM event UNION SELECT contact_technique AS data, 'technique' AS contact FROM event UNION SELECT contact_engagement AS data, 'engagement' AS contact FROM event ) tmp ) tmp WHERE telephone LIKE '0%' OR telephone LIKE '33%' OR telephone LIKE '' AND email LIKE '%@%' GROUP BY name,email,telephone
